level.heading: Specified lesser violations.
level.text: ยง 28-201.2.3 Specified lesser violations. The commissioner shall classify the following violations as lesser violations: 1. A violation of item 5 of section 1110.1 or of section 1110.2 of the New York city building code, or a violation of section 28-313.1 or 28-313.2 of the administrative code of the city of New York.
